text:
This is the animated webp (which is not supported on safari if you’ve not updated to big sur) <https://f.HubSpotusercontent10.net/hubfs/1841461/methodology-img/Video/diagram_innovationcurve_3.webp>

This is the animated png, which has all the frames except the first one stripped out
<https://f.HubSpotusercontent10.net/hubfs/1841461/methodology-img/Video/diagram_innovationcurve_3.png>

I’ve attached the animated png file so you can see what it’s supposed to look like,

I ended up using a video with both a webm source and a hevc source (as this needed a transparent background)

<http://ezgif.com|ezgif.com> is a good site if your looking to quickly create some animated files to test

You can see the support for apng is better in safari here <https://caniuse.com/?search=apng>
<https://caniuse.com/?search=webp>
Hello, folks :wave: Please do needful to me. When I am creating 5, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11 columns why it's not taking equal width automatically. Even manually I am unable to give equal space to columns.
